title: Stage Lv10-S15
description: Level 10 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: If I can find the time, I'd love to go.
If money weren't an issue, I'd do it right away.
learning_points: Level 10 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 만약에 시간만 된다면, 꼭 가고 싶어.
sentences.en: If I can find the time, I'd love to go.

sentences.kr: 돈이 문제가 아니라면, 당장이라도 할 텐데.
sentences.en: If money weren't an issue, I'd do it right away.

sentences.kr: 날씨만 좋으면, 피크닉 가기 딱 좋을 텐데.
sentences.en: If the weather's nice, it'd be perfect for a picnic.

sentences.kr: 네가 괜찮다면, 내일 만날 수 있어?
sentences.en: If you're okay with it, could we meet tomorrow?

sentences.kr: 상황이 허락한다면, 더 오래 있고 싶어.
sentences.en: If circumstances allow, I'd like to stay longer.

sentences.kr: 운이 좋으면, 표를 구할 수 있을 거야.
sentences.en: If we're lucky, we should be able to get tickets.

sentences.kr: 모든 게 계획대로 된다면, 다음 주에 끝날 거야.
sentences.en: If everything goes according to plan, we'll finish next week.

sentences.kr: 길이 막히지 않는다면, 한 시간이면 도착해.
sentences.en: If there's no traffic, we'll be there in an hour.
